description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jigsaw World is jigsaw puzzle game with a twist. Perform combos to increase the time and finish the puzzle on time. Compete through the story mode doing over 150 puzzles on the 5 continents or select a puzzle and configure the difficulty level to play in.   A great classic family game for people of all ages and experiences thanks to its configurable difficulty level.
